text: to vah usakee baat par prasann hokar muskaraaya aur kaha, "mere rab! mujhe sambhaale rakh ki main teree us krpa par krtagyata dikhaata rahoon jo toone mujhapar aur mere maan-baap par kee hai. aur yah ki achchha karm karoon jo tujhe pasand aae aur apanee dayaaluta se mujhe apane achchhe bandon mein daakhil kar.
